title: Consequences
description: Claire Nichols is thrust into a life she never imagined or wanted. She depends on her intuition and adaptability for survival. Can she trust her instincts when it seems a serious lapse in judgment caused her life to take a drastic and brutal turn? She attempts to endure a life that changes everything from her looks to her name. Every aspect of her livelihood depends on a tall wealthy dark haired and eyed businessman. Did fate bring Anthony Rawlings into her life? Or was it something more calculated? Sinister? Will she be able to survive the Consequences?
author: Aleatha Romig
